Jantz
is the Rudolph still available---I have 20 cards to go for the minor league set
I just added some more cards to the list.  If interested, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url]  Thanks, Bill

Bill, email inc on the SGC 50 Conroy batting. Thanks!

Edit: Bill, got him in today. The 50 was definitely worth it. It's amazing how much difference there is between a 40 and 50. Thanks again!!!

Best wishes with the rest of your sale,

Bill
